LINEAR_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Linear API key — create at Settings > API > Personal API Keys

LINEAR_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Webhook signing secret (32+ chars) — create at Settings > API > Webhooks

REDIS_URL.description: Redis connection URL — add Vercel KV or Upstash Redis, then paste the connection string

NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_URL.description: Public URL of your deployment (e.g., https://your-app.vercel.app)

WORKER_API_KEY.description: Bearer token for worker authentication (generate a random 32+ char string)

CRON_SECRET.description: Secret token for cron endpoint authentication

SESSION_HASH_SALT.description: Salt for session ID hashing (generate a random string)
